summary: Frontend-only testing completed for App Studio Pro multi-page website. All navigation, routes, and page content verified successfully.
critical_code_review_comments: Contact form submission is MOCKED - simulates success on frontend without backend API
context_for_next_testing_agent: Multi-page React Router v7 app fully functional. All 5 routes (/, /about, /services, /blog, /contact) working. Navigation links and footer links navigate correctly. Active nav state highlights current page. Contact form has client-side validation and shows success toast (MOCKED submission). Services page shows all 11 services. About page has stats, timeline, values, and team sections. Blog page has search bar, category filters, and featured post.

mocked_apis.contact_form_submission: Frontend simulates success - no backend API integration
